basics.name: Tay März
basics.label: Junior Full Stack Developer - Apprentice
basics.summary: Junior Full Stack Developer with a passion for building web applications. Currently seeking opportunities to further develop my skills in a professional setting.

work.name: Greenmark IT GmbH
work.summary: Developing and maintaining web applications, as well as contributing to the development of new features and services.
responsibilities: Developing and maintaining web applications, including the company's main website and various internal tools.
Contributing to the development of new features and services, including a new customer portal and a new internal tool for managing customer data.

work.name: Thiele Bakery
work.summary: Serving and assisting customers, promoting delicious baked goods, baking and refining products, preparing savory snacks and specialty coffees, and ensuring an attractive presentation of the baked goods.

work.name: AGVolution GmbH
work.summary: Developing a self-hosted AI assistant prototype with expertise in agriculture, as well as contributing to both backend and frontend tasks across various web services.
highlights: Developed a self-hosted AI assistant prototype with domain expertise in agriculture, leading the project almost entirely independently.
responsibilities: Developed a self-hosted AI assistant prototype with domain expertise in agriculture, leading the project almost entirely independently.
Assisted with backend and frontend development for various web services.
achievements: Successfully completed the AI assistant prototype, fully equipped with agricultural knowledge, capable of holding steady conversations, and proficient in recommending soil types, product prices, and optimal usage per acre.

work.name: EasySystems
work.summary: Contributing to the development of the EasySystems Discord bot family.
highlights: Developed Bots such as; EasyYAUDAB and EasyLevel
Started working with AI and Machine Learning
responsibilities: Developing and maintaining the EasyLevel bot, a leveling bot for Discord servers.
achievements: Developed the EasyYAUDAB bot, a AI powered Discord bot that can answer questions and provide information on various topics.

volunteer.summary: Moderating the PATHFindr community Discord Server, and ensuring a positive and welcoming environment for all members.
highlights: Consistently contributed to the community for over a year, approaching two years of dedicated service.
Helped maintain a positive and inclusive atmosphere for members, fostering community growth and engagement.
